author: mturk
msg: Use shm_alloc_worker, so that worker get it's id set, and that we can
monitor the total number of workers.

author: mturk
msg: Add worker_list to worker_env, so we can get all workers.
Add worker_map to service, so it can be updated on per-vhost basis.

author: mturk
msg: Add simple file locking. Since this will be used only for updates, the
performance is not an issue here.
